title: Most deaths is feeding?
body: So i was recently perma banned because i went 5/12, i had the most deaths on my team and they said i was inting.....so the person with the most deaths is inting apparently? how many of you say the person with the most deaths for feeding?

replies.body:
feeding is not the same as inting. 

If you can post your reform card, we can analyze what happened.

based off of this it looks like you ran it down

https://imgur.com/ujsRb3a
I want to believe you, but the truth is there's typically more to these cases than meets the eye...

well it depends.

If i make a shit play, its not inting.
if i purposefully walk into the enemy team, it is.

and number of deaths dont count as feeding/inting, its really WHY you are dead.

I'm a support main, so i die to protect my adc.
perfectly fine.

If i want to kill myself and run into the enemy tower, its inting.
Post the information given on the perma ban card. If you don't know what I'm talking about, it is that thing that appears on your client when you try to log in

Depends on how you kept dying.



Since i wasn't there idk
